sentence.Network_en: We sat round the fire to keep ourselves warm.
We splurged on Bohemian glass for gifts, and for ourselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们花了很多钱买波希米亚玻璃制品送人和自用。

sentence.Network_en: We're kidding ourselves, Bill. We're not winning, we're not even doing well.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在自己骗自己，比尔。我们没有赢，我们甚至都没有发挥好。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 见be 条 be oneself, not be oneself

entry.def: You use ourselves to refer to yourself and one or more other people as a group.

example.ex: We sat round the fire to keep ourselves warm...
It was the first time we admitted to ourselves that we were tired.
example.tran: 这是我们第一次承认自己累了。

entry.tran: （泛指）我们自己，人们自己（当主语和宾语为同一群人时，用作动词或介词的宾语）
entry.def: A speaker or writer sometimes uses ourselves to refer to people in general. Ourselves is used as the object of a verb or preposition when the subject refers to the same people.

example.ex: We all know that when we exert ourselves our heart rate increases.
example.tran: 我们都知道太卖命了会导致心跳加速。

entry.tran: （用于强调第一人称复数主语；在比较正式的英语中，有时代替 us 作动词或介词的宾语以示强调）我们自己，我们本人
entry.def: You use ourselves to emphasize a first person plural subject. In more formal English, ourselves is sometimes used instead of 'us' as the object of a verb or preposition, for emphasis.

example.ex: Others are feeling just the way we ourselves would feel in the same situation...
example.tran: 别人此时的感受和我们自己在同样的情形下时没什么两样。

example.ex: The people who will suffer won't be people like ourselves.
example.tran: 受苦的不会是像我们这样的人。

entry.def: If you say something such as 'We did it ourselves', you are indicating that something was done by you and a particular group of other people, rather than anyone else.

example.ex: We villagers built that ourselves, we had no help from anyone.
example.tran: 那是我们村民自己修建的，没有依靠任何人的帮助。

auth_sentence.content: But we also knew we had to pace ourselves.
auth_sentence.res_content: But we also knew we had to pace ourselves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But we also knew we had to pace ourselves.

auth_sentence.content: Sometimes we have to pinch ourselves, said Parkin.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sometimes we have to pinch ourselves, said Parkin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sometimes we have to pinch ourselves, said Parkin.

auth_sentence.content: We can't get too ahead of ourselves though.
auth_sentence.res_content: We can't get too ahead of ourselves though.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We can't get too ahead of ourselves though.

Sentence.sentence: Although it hardly seems practical to trick ourselves into eating less.
We feel disappointed in ourselves and ashamed.

But why don't we offer to pay for the printing of the programs ourselves on condition that on the front cover there's something like This program is presented with the compliments of Norland Electronics, and free advertising of course.
Today's world offers more opportunity than ever to follow the advice of the Walker Brothers and make it easy on ourselves
Few of us wish to turn the clock back, but perhaps we need to remind ourselves how useful the right obstacles can be.

sentences.en: We try and keep ourselves informed about current trends.
sentences.cn: 我们设法随时了解形势的发展。

sentences.en: We have to find ourselves a new home.
sentences.cn: 我们得给自己找个新家。
这幢房子是我们亲自建造的。

sentences.en: We ourselves will do the work.
sentences.cn: 我们将亲自做这项工作。

jushi.english: We dressed (ourselves) quickly and went downstairs.
jushi.chinese: 我们匆匆穿好衣服就下楼了。

jushi.english: Except for ourselves, the whole village was asleep.
jushi.chinese: 除了我们以外,全村的人都入睡了。
这幢房子是我们亲自建造的。
